source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: The Ultimate Knitting Course: Knit From Beginner To Expert
items.headline: From complete novice to expert knitter in two simple projects - A scarf and gloves
objectives_summary: Follow any pattern and correct their own mistakes
All the basic knitting techniques - Knit, Purl, Cast On, Cast Off, Increase, Decrease.
Create a scarf and gloves

items.headline: Recycling a pair of jeans into a stylish tote bag
objectives_summary: You will be able to sew a complete tote bag.

Learn how to draw the human figure from scratch

items.title: 書道LEVEL3:Mindful Japanese Calligraphy for Beginners 8-12/30
items.headline: SHODO by Nohoh-Method: The Complete KAISHO Style! Basic Srokes & KANJIs. WITHOUT Japanese Knowledge! Creative & Relaxed
objectives_summary: Be able to manage five basic strokes and learn 17 Ideographs (KANJIs) of Japanese calligraphy in Kaisho style
Learn the basic knowledge of the Japanese Calligraphy SHODO
Learn about the proper tools for SHODO and how to use them

items.title: Watercolor painting outside or 'EN PLEIN AIR.' How to start.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: You will learn how to select a composition from a large view, how to plan, sketch and paint outside. I've made it easy.
objectives_summary: Learn to extract a painting composition from a view.
Learn a reliable formula to plan any painting.
Learn how to plan an order of work.

items.headline: Learn how to make perfect molds and copies  with traditional technique. SOLID RESIN. Suitable for Bronzes
objectives_summary: Make a mold of silicon rubber and resin with fiberglass
Create a rigid and durable piece of filled resin (without fiberglass)
Replicate small or medium-dimensional figures, be it an original sculpture or an object that you love

items.title: Learn Traditional Origami - Video Tutorials & Resources
items.headline: Master Origami classics in minutes with Videos Lessons including the Peace Crane, Lily, Frog, Butterfly and more
objectives_summary: Learn how to make 7 Traditional Origami Models: Peace Crane, Butterfly, Boat, Flapping Crane, Jumping Frog, Lily Flower & Star Box
Get Creative! Design or Colour-in your own Origami paper, with the help of the Origami Crease Patterns provided

items.title: Abstract Expressionism
items.headline: A study of the plastic self in the moment.

Increased appreciation of Art
The course enhances human development.
